subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Elian Herrera hit a tiebreaking single off Jonathan Papelbon in the ninth inning to lift the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers over the Philadelphia Phillies, 4-3, on Monday night.
snippet: Elian Herrera hit a tiebreaking single off Jonathan Papelbon in the ninth inning to lift the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers over the Philadelphia Phillies, 4-3, on Monday night.
